name: Ext_R5_ImplementationGuide_ma_re_profile
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.profile for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.profile from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImplementationGuide|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Profile(s) this is an example of
element.definition: If present, indicates profile(s) the instance is valid against.
element.comment: `ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.profile` maps to R4B `ImplementationGuide.manifest.resource.example[x]`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
